4.kik: No ũndũ ŨMWE tu wagĩrĩirwo nĩ kũmenya ũrĩa mũrimũ wa Korona

12.kik: Mũrimũ ũyũ ũgwatagio rĩrĩa tũmatata tũtũ

13.kik: Ikara haraihu. Wĩ ũraihu wa mita 2 ndũngĩkinyĩrwo nĩ tũmatata tũrĩa tũnene.

17.kik: Kwoguo ũngĩona mũndũ akĩenda kũhaya/gwathimũra kana ta e mũrwaru no wĩke ũũ:

18.kik: Kana ũmahe maciki. No mahaĩre kana maathimũrĩre maciki-inĩ ĩyo na kũgitĩra arĩa othe me hakuhĩ

22.kik: No gũkorwo ti mũrwaru, no kwĩgitĩra tu aregitĩra

23.kik: Andũ mena bairasi cia Korona no  maage kuonania ndariri, no marĩ o na ũhoti wa gũcitaambia

24.kik: Nĩ wega mũno kwaga gũthiĩ kũndũ kwĩna andũ angĩ, tondũ ndũngĩmenya nũũ ũngĩkorwo arĩ mũrwarũ.

32.kik: & ona kana na nja wa maciki yaku ya ũthiũ

38.kik: Ona kũrĩ o ũguo, rĩmwe mata ma mũndũ mũrwaru no magĩe indo-inĩ ingĩ ta …

39.kik: inyuothe mwahota kũnyitwo nĩ mũrimũ ũyũ wa Korona

40.kik: kana ũhuutie ũthiũ wa mũndũ wendete

42.kik: Na ũngĩhuutia kĩmwe kĩa indo ici na mahĩtia, ũcooke wĩhuutie ũthiũ waku,

43.kik: na njĩra ĩrĩa njega mũno ya gũcinina nĩ gũcithaambia na thabuni, kilorini kana dawa ya thanitaitha.

44.kik: Bairasi cia mũrimũ ũyũ no cikare mathaa maigana ũna indo-inĩ

47.kik: Na nĩkĩo arĩ wega mũno kũrũmĩrĩra motaaro maya

51.kik: Ndũkehuutie ũthiũ. (Ona kana ũthiũ wa mũndũ ũngĩ o wothe.) Angĩkorwo no nginya ũhuutie, amba wĩthambe mooko na thabuni weega biũ.

52.kik: O kahinda ta karĩa ũngĩoya kũina karwĩmbo ga gũcũgia mwana

56.kik: wĩthambe na thuutha wa mooko maku.

57.kik: Gwĩthamba mooko weega biũ nĩ ta atĩa?

58.kik: No ũngĩhuutia, ndũkamake. Wĩthambe tu mooko na thabuni weega bĩũ.

59.kik: Ningĩ, geria mũno ndũkahuutie mwena wa na nja wa maciki.

61.kik: *Mbakitĩria nĩ ikũragĩra na thĩiniĩ wa maciki ũngĩmĩkĩra gwa kahinda karaihu.

62.kik: Te maciki waigua yambĩrĩria kũgĩa na hinya ũkĩhuhia. Ndũkamĩkĩre makĩria ya mũthenya ũmwe!

67.kik: O mũndũ akorwo na taurũ yake

68.kik: Ndũkahũthĩre indo ta ici na andũ angĩ: irio, thaani, iciko, ikombe, taurũ.

69.kik: Ndũngĩhota kwĩhuutia ũthiũ na kĩgokora gĩaku ona ũngĩgeria.

70.kik: Kũngĩhoteka, hũthĩra kĩgokora kana ciande kũhingũra mĩrango handũ ha mooko.

74.kik: Hingo ciothe wĩthambe mooko na thabuni …

81.kik: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)

82.kik: "The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)

83.kik: "How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)

84.kik: Mohoro makĩria megiĩ ũgima wa mwĩrĩ:

85.kik:
Ndeto makĩria: Mootaro megiĩ ũgima wa mwĩrĩ maheanĩtwo na njĩra ta ĩno ya mbica cia katuni nĩ mateithagia mũno kũrigĩrĩria mĩrimũ ya kũgwatanio ta homa, na no mahũthĩke hingo ciothe, ona rĩrĩa gũtarĩ na kĩng’ũki.  
Kĩhumo: Moohoro marĩa me kabuki-inĩ gaka ka mbica cia tũtuni maumanĩte na ũmenyo wa mũrimũ wa KOVID-19 nginyanagia mweri 28 Februarĩ 2020, ihumo cia ndeto ici nĩcio ici ithatũ. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html﻿https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/ https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Moohoro makĩria: No wĩgĩĩre na kabuku gaka ka mbica cia tũtuni ge ka PDF kuuma rũrenda-inĩ rũrũ: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Megiĩ Ũhũthĩri: Kabuku gaka ka mbica kaheanĩtwo tũhũ kũrĩ mũingĩ ũgatambie nenda-inĩ, Whatsapp na Telegram. Andũ no marute nenda-inĩ na macabithie na ta mbica cia gũcuuria ciĩ ciao kana irĩ cia kũrutana mĩciĩ-inĩ, macukuru-inĩ, na maobici-inĩ.
Rĩrĩa ũraheana kabuku gaka ririkana maũndũ maya 3: 1) Ndũrĩ na rũtha rwa kũgarũra ũndũ ona ũrĩkũ. 2) Mbica iria iria irĩ haha itingĩhũthĩrwo na njĩra ya gwetha mbeca. 3) Angĩkorwo ũrahũthĩra rũrenda-inĩ, onania mũthondeki wa thĩiniĩ wa FB kũrĩa ũgwĩkĩra @weimankowart, na kũrĩ IG wĩkĩre @weimankow (IG), kana wandĩke linki harĩ instagram com/weimankow
Nĩguo ũrĩhũthĩre na njĩra ingĩ o ciothe,  tũma ihoya kũrĩ: comicsforgood@gmail.com

90.eng: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow

bookText.eng:
About Coronavirus





















































































About Coronavirus



Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
bookText.kik:
Mũrimũ wa Korona

Translated by Timothy G. Kamau

No ũndũ ŨMWE tu wagĩrĩirwo nĩ kũmenya ũrĩa mũrimũ wa Korona
ŨGWATANAGIO
Kanua  
Iniũrũ
Maitho
Twakũingĩra  
Mũndũ ũtarĩ mũrwaru
Mũrwaru wa Korona

Mũrimũ ũyũ ũgwatagio rĩrĩa tũmatata tũtũ
Ikara haraihu. Wĩ ũraihu wa mita 2 ndũngĩkinyĩrwo nĩ tũmatata tũrĩa tũnene.
1
Mita 2
Achoo!
Kwoguo ũngĩona mũndũ akĩenda kũhaya/gwathimũra kana ta e mũrwaru no wĩke ũũ:
Kana ũmahe maciki. No mahaĩre kana maathimũrĩre maciki-inĩ ĩyo na kũgitĩra arĩa othe me hakuhĩ
2
Mũhe gatambaya ga *kĩmira*

KANA,
No gũkorwo ti mũrwaru, no kwĩgitĩra tu aregitĩra
Andũ mena bairasi cia Korona no  maage kuonania ndariri, no marĩ o na ũhoti wa gũcitaambia

Nĩ wega mũno kwaga gũthiĩ kũndũ kwĩna andũ angĩ, tondũ ndũngĩmenya nũũ ũngĩkorwo arĩ mũrwarũ.
Tũmĩtĩ-inĩ twa kũrĩa
Mũndũ ũtarĩ mũrwaru
Mĩcibi-inĩ ya ngari
Mbatoni-inĩ cia ributi
Ticiũ-inĩ
Ikombe-inĩ
Thimũ-inĩ na kombiuta-inĩ
& ona kana na nja wa maciki yaku ya ũthiũ
Cuma-inĩ cia ngathĩ
Maũci  
Tũramu-inĩ
Icũhĩ-inĩ cia mĩrango

Moko-inĩ mao
Ona kũrĩ o ũguo, rĩmwe mata ma mũndũ mũrwaru no magĩe indo-inĩ ingĩ ta …
inyuothe mwahota kũnyitwo nĩ mũrimũ ũyũ wa Korona
kana ũhuutie ũthiũ wa mũndũ wendete    

wĩrigithe maitho

Na ũngĩhuutia kĩmwe kĩa indo ici na mahĩtia, ũcooke wĩhuutie ũthiũ waku, 
na njĩra ĩrĩa njega mũno ya gũcinina nĩ gũcithaambia na thabuni, kilorini kana dawa ya thanitaitha.
Bairasi cia mũrimũ ũyũ no cikare mathaa maigana ũna indo-inĩ
Thabuni  

Na nĩkĩo arĩ wega mũno kũrũmĩrĩra motaaro maya
Wĩthaambe na thabuni nginya haha
Thabuni
Kĩgokora
Ndũkehuutie ũthiũ. (Ona kana ũthiũ wa mũndũ ũngĩ o wothe.) Angĩkorwo no nginya ũhuutie, amba wĩthambe mooko na thabuni weega biũ.  
O kahinda ta karĩa ũngĩoya kũina karwĩmbo ga gũcũgia mwana
ndwara-inĩ thĩinĩ
gwa kahinda ta ga thekondi 20
gatagatĩ ga Ciara
wĩthambe na thuutha wa mooko maku.
Gwĩthamba mooko weega biũ nĩ ta atĩa?
No ũngĩhuutia, ndũkamake. Wĩthambe tu mooko na thabuni weega bĩũ.
Ningĩ, geria mũno ndũkahuutie mwena wa na nja wa maciki.
Tũmatata twa mata
*Mbakitĩria nĩ ikũragĩra na thĩiniĩ wa maciki ũngĩmĩkĩra gwa kahinda karaihu.
Te maciki waigua yambĩrĩria kũgĩa na hinya ũkĩhuhia. Ndũkamĩkĩre makĩria ya mũthenya ũmwe! 
Hũthĩra gĩciko gĩa kũihũra
Mwana
Baba
Mami  
O mũndũ akorwo na taurũ yake
Ndũkahũthĩre indo ta ici na andũ angĩ: irio, thaani, iciko, ikombe, taurũ.
Ndũngĩhota kwĩhuutia ũthiũ na kĩgokora gĩaku ona ũngĩgeria.

Kũngĩhoteka, hũthĩra kĩgokora kana ciande kũhingũra mĩrango handũ ha mooko.
Mũciĩ
na wacoka kuuma kũrĩ mũingĩ
Mbere ya kũrĩa
Hingo ciothe wĩthambe mooko na thabuni …
Wa mũthia,
Thabuni
Nĩ twĩgitĩre,
ithuothe!
Nĩ twĩgitĩre,
ithuothe!
Thabuni  
Mathome ũmenye mangĩ maingĩ!
"This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
"The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)
"How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)
Mohoro makĩria megiĩ ũgima wa mwĩrĩ:
Ndeto makĩria: Mootaro megiĩ ũgima wa mwĩrĩ maheanĩtwo na njĩra ta ĩno ya mbica cia katuni nĩ mateithagia mũno kũrigĩrĩria mĩrimũ ya kũgwatanio ta homa, na no mahũthĩke hingo ciothe, ona rĩrĩa gũtarĩ na kĩng’ũki.

Rĩrĩa ũraheana kabuku gaka ririkana maũndũ maya 3: 1) Ndũrĩ na rũtha rwa kũgarũra ũndũ ona ũrĩkũ. 2) Mbica iria iria irĩ haha itingĩhũthĩrwo na njĩra ya gwetha mbeca. 3) Angĩkorwo ũrahũthĩra rũrenda-inĩ, onania mũthondeki wa thĩiniĩ wa FB kũrĩa ũgwĩkĩra @weimankowart, na kũrĩ IG wĩkĩre @weimankow (IG), kana wandĩke linki harĩ instagram com/weimankow

summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19
title: Mũrimũ wa Korona
